ing: 5 Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and diced
des: "This is a wonderful tangy, sweet, and delicious way to eat apples.  I love it with apples, but my mom also does this with strawberries or pears.  I've also done this with just one apple for myself when I wanted a quick snack. Pink lady and red delicious apples will also work well."
ins: In a large bowl, mix together the balsamic vinegar, brown sugar and black pepper. Taste and adjust sugar and vinegar to your personal preference. Add the apples, and stir to coat.
